*Welcome to Up To Date!*

Up To Date is a Slack bot that provides you with a personalised feed of announcements, news, and happenings within the Slack. Let's get you set up to use Up To Date!
Up To Date uses topics to personalise your feed. Click the adjacent button to choose topics that interest you (at least one).
You can subscribe to a channel to recieve posts from that channel. Click the adjacent button to choose channels to subscribe to (at least one).

You're all set up! If you want to make a post, run `/utdpost`. The post will be sent to the feeds of users who have subscribed to the topics and channels that the post is relevant to. To add a topic, run `/utdtopic`. Oh, and to check your feed, take a look at my home page. See ya' round!
